page.title: 13THE LITTLE CROFT NURSERY
page.content: The Little Croft is a nursery. It is in Lower Thurvaston near Longford. There is another nursery at Longford Hall. The Little Croft is owned by a man and his wife. They do most of the work by themselves. They have been working at the nursery for more than three years. Sometimes two boys from across the road help them. The boys help them to plant the seedlings in the spring. The Little Croft sells lots of plants. They also sell jam. They have a paddock across the road where they grow beans and leeks. People call at weekends and in the afternoon to buy plants and jam. It is a very small nursery. There is a very big greenhouse and a small greenhouse.
